title: Login page throws 500 error
description: When user tries to login with valid credentials, the page crashes with HTTP 500 error.
comments: Issue happens only on production; works fine in staging.

title: UI misalignment on dashboard
description: The dashboard widgets overlap on smaller screens.
comments: Reported on Chrome and Safari; needs CSS fix.

title: Data sync failure
description: User transactions are not syncing with reporting DB. Found mismatched record counts.
comments: Seems related to ETL job failure.

title: Slow API response
description: Payment API takes more than 10 seconds to respond intermittently.
comments: Observed spike in latency after recent deployment.

title: NullPointerException on user profile load
description: Clicking user profile causes app to crash with NullPointerException.

title: Security vulnerability in password reset
description: Password reset link does not expire, can be reused multiple times.
